attributes.action: encourage our and other countries to open borders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: so the building of haiti can get under way with out the ppl getting in the way of reconstruction.they would be at less risk of epidemic of illness and disease.funding by the agencies dealing with the aftermath.this is a humanitaian mission not for a perminent resetalment,they go back when its safe to do so,surely this would be a better way to spend the money donated
